name: New Zealand Europe Business Council
goal: To promote EU in NZ from a trade and cultural perspective. To work towards tariff free trade between the two. To provide a platform for EU membership states co-operation locally in NZ. To lift the profile and understanding of EU in NZ. To receive and support delegations from EU. To host events for our members
interests: Agriculture, Climate Action, Culture, Energy, Trade
euInitiatives: Member of EBO system. Number one priority is to promote FTA discussions and move onto negotiation phase.
